        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Good , the Bad and the Ugly</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das gute, das falsche und das häßliche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bon, le mauvais et le laid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O bom, o mau e o feio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il buon, il difettoso ed il ugly</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αγαθό, κακός και ο άσχημος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El bueno, el malo y el feo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interesting illustrated explanation of brain research on brain activity and processing</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neurology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Interessieren veranschaulichte Erklärung der
Gehirnforschung auf Gehirnaktivität und -verarbeitung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intéresser a illustré l'explication de la 
recherche de cerveau sur l'activité et le traitement de cerveau</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interessar ilustrou a explanação da pesquisa do
cérebro sobre a atividade e processar do cérebro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interessare ha illustrato la spiegazione di 
ricerca del cervello su attività e sull'elaborare del cervello</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ενδιαφέρει επεξήγησε την εξήγηση της έρευνας 
εγκεφάλου για τη δραστηριότητα εγκεφάλου και της επεξεργασίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El interesar ilustró la explicación de la 
investigación del cerebro sobre actividad y el proceso del cerebro</string>
          </description>
